name: ReCursed (itch) (Reeds)
description:
Made for Mini-Jam 61

ReCursed is a Rainlike rougelike looter shooter game .. where all the loot is cursed. Everything was made solo in under 72 hours (excluding a little help from FreeSound.org - the best sound resource out there)

Controls and How to Play (Didn't have time for a tutorial)

WASD to move

Space to jump,

CTL to crouch/slide

Left Click to fire weapon

E to interact with relic chests

The objective is listed in the top right of the screen. The little chests scattered throughout the map hold the relics, and the player's money (shards) is in the top left.

If the WebGL runs like garbage (and you are on windows), I recommend the standalone - the game is a little CPU heavy... (Also, shooter controls sometimes seem to match up with chrome's add bookmark hotkeys... so...)
